prompts: Create a cute, fluffy Pokemon that brings joy to everyone around it.
Show me a playful creature with soft pink fur and big blue eyes.
Imagine a small, round Pokemon that loves to sing and dance in the fields.
Generate a whimsical character with a cheerful personality and a love for adventure.
Design an adorable Pokemon that can float in the air with its big ears.
Give me a friendly creature that enjoys making friends with other Pokemon.
Make a round Pokemon with a soft body and a charming smile.
